queries.query: sum by(remoteIP, username, keyspace, table) (client_throughput_read{axonfunction='rate',dc=~'$dc',rack=~'$rack',host_id=~'$host_id',keyspace=~'$keyspace', table=~'$scope'})
sum by (remoteIP, username, keyspace, table) (client_throughput_write{axonfunction='rate',dc=~'$dc',rack=~'$rack',host_id=~'$host_id',keyspace=~'$keyspace', table=~'$scope'})

details.desc: The commit metrics MBean is used for troubleshooting index performance as well as data consistency issues caused by asynchronous commits between different index replicas. This MBean is also useful for fine-tuning indexing back pressure. The commit metrics MBean records the amount of time that is spent to execute two main phases of a commit operation on the index.
Comprising the time spent by flushing the async indexing queue. (microseconds)
Comprising the time spent by actually executing the commit on the index. (microseconds)
The 1-minute rate of work throughput per second.
Get the 1-minute rate of processed tasks per second.
Get the 1-minute rate of ingested tasks per second.
Get the current size of each processing queues.
Get the rated total number of processed tasks for all workers.
Get the average back pressure pause
How long it takes to initialize the merge process.
How long it takes to initialize the merge process.
How long it takes to warm up segments to speed up cold queries.
Comprises the time spent by a query request waiting for a thread to execute.
Comprises the time spent by a query request waiting for a thread to execute.
Comprises the time spent by a query request waiting for a thread to execute.
Comprises the time spent by a node to retrieve a single row from the database. This value will be computed on the local node hosting the requested data.

Comprises the total amount of time spent by the coordinator node to distribute the query and gather/process results from shards. This value is computed only on query coordinator nodes. Includes RETRIEVE and EXECUTE in the total.
Percent progress, where a value of 100 indicates that reindexing is not running.
Number of reindex requests submitted since node start-up; includes all reindex types.
Number of reindex requests submitted by user since node start-up.
Number of reindex requests submitted by user since node start-up.

Number of reindexing tasks executed with deleteAll==true since startup.
The time spent preparing the actual index update.
The time spent to actually execute the index update on Apache Lucene®.
Updated for reindexing only. The time spent by the index update task into the index pool.
